name: Tanks III Battle Of Freedom
description:
April 2045. As the Rebels make their final foray into the war for Europe, a war-hardened army sergeant named Zardabibedy is responsible for command of a tank, you are a key member of this five-man team on a deadly mission behind the lines Enemies. In smaller numbers and with little weaponry, Zardabibedy and his men face innumerable adversities in their heroic attempts to attack the heart of enslaved Germany guaranteeing the freedom of Europe and the entire planet.

                                                                         FEATURES

• multiplayer
• competitive
• funny
• Crazy
• Challenger
